task.summary: Just a change of the page title

MESSAGE.value: Just a change of the page title

+Modified the search module to correct for searching by email, or id +Modified Menu.display_table_columns() to add a show=0 variable. show=0 (hide) show=1 (show column headers) This initializes the table before hand to avoid an error that I was getting after removing the column list Clean up some code and remove some commented code.
